newsitem.title: USA: CCC buys 20,550 tonnes wheat for Yemen, Jordan.
newsitem.headline: CCC buys 20,550 tonnes wheat for Yemen, Jordan.

text.p: The Commodity Credit Corp of the U.S. Department of Agriculture said it bought 9,600 tonnes of soft white wheat for export to Yemen and 10,950 tonnes of hard red winter wheat for export to Jordan.
The wheat was purchased from Continental Grain and slated for April 1-25 delivery. The soft white wheat was priced at $177.37 and the hard red winter at $176.64, FOB Beaumont.
